product.title: Donald Duck's Birthday | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Donald Duck's Birthday

When Donald Duck’s beloved fishing boat is destroyed in a storm, his sympathetic nephews decide to cheer him up by buying a new one as a birthday surprise. At the fishing store, they quickly realize that all the money they’ve pooled together isn’t nearly enough to purchase a new boat. With a little help from Scrooge McDuck, Huey, Dewey and Louie buy a kit to build the boat themselves. After working hard for days on end, they present the boat to their uncle at a surprise birthday party. This heartwarming tale shows young readers the benefits of generosity, hard work, and earning their own money.

Tie-in Activity: Instead of buying a new toy for your child, purchase a do-it-yourself kit that the two of you can build together. Whether it’s a model car, a toy train, or a wooden dollhouse, the end result will provide a significant sense of accomplishment while providing a valuable bonding experience.
